column1: Further for classifying the results for Hindi we used the definition of named entities as given by Chinchor CITATION as for entity names organizations (OE)
The rule based approach uses the morphological and contextual evidence CITATION of a natural language and consequently determines the named entities.
The statistical techniques use large annotated data to train a model CITATION (like Hidden Markov Model) and subsequently examine it with the test data.

It is an enhancement of the Levenshtein CITATION edit distance algorithm.
Tapering is one enhancement in which we weigh mismatches at the beginning of the string with higher score than mismatches towards the end CITATION.
Other enhancements are those in which input strings are mapped to their phonemic representation
